backend/main.mo: Motoko actor providing financial calculation functions including future value with compound interest, inflation, and tax adjustments, plus text validation utilities for alphanumeric input, email, and positive numbers.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting two high-confidence features: investigating/resolving 'Failed to fetch' errors in CoinGecko API integration, and adding error boundaries with improved error handling for network failures.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of frontend components including calculator modules (P&L, Risk, DCA, Moon Math, Future Value), error handling components, CoinGecko API integration, formatting utilities, and responsive layout components with mobile-first design.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark themes, defining colors for UI elements including background, foreground, primary, secondary, muted, accent, destructive, borders, and chart colors.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with SEO metadata, Open Graph tags, Twitter Card configuration, Google Fonts preconnect, and service worker registration for offline support.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main application component with ErrorBoundary wrapper, tabbed navigation for six calculator modules (P&L, Risk, DCA, Moon Math, Future Value, Decision), and responsive tab layout.
frontend/src/components/actions/ClearSav: Button component with confirmation dialog that clears all localStorage data using clearAllStorageKeys utility and reloads the page.
frontend/src/components/branding/AppLogo: Responsive logo component rendering CryptoWise branding image with picture element for optimized delivery and size variants for mobile and desktop.
frontend/src/components/coins/CoinSearch: A searchable dropdown component for selecting cryptocurrency coins, integrating with CoinGecko API and displaying coin thumbnails, names, and symbols with loading and error states.
frontend/src/components/feedback/ApiErro: A reusable error alert component that displays API error messages with an optional retry button.
frontend/src/components/feedback/ErrorBo: A React error boundary class component that catches and displays unhandled errors with options to retry or reload the page.
frontend/src/components/feedback/Offline: A fixed-position alert banner that appears when the user loses internet connection, using the useOnlineStatus hook.
frontend/src/components/forms/DCAEntryRo: A form row component for entering DCA (Dollar Cost Averaging) trade entries with buy price and amount inputs, plus a remove button.
The main application layout wrapper providing header with logo, footer with attribution, background styling, and offline indicator integration.
frontend/src/components/layout/GlassCard: A styled Card wrapper component that applies glassmorphism effects with backdrop blur and semi-transparent background.
frontend/src/components/share/ShareTrade: A button component that exports a trade plan card as a PNG image using canvas rendering, with loading state during export.
frontend/src/components/share/TradePlanC: A forwardRef card component that displays formatted trade plan data with coin information, designed for export/sharing functionality.
frontend/src/components/visual/RiskRewar: A visual component that displays risk-to-reward ratio using colored badges and horizontal bar charts with quality assessment.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: A React Query hook that manages Internet Identity authentication and creates backend actors, invalidating dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCoinGecko.ts: Custom React Query hooks for fetching coin search results, current prices, and market data from CoinGecko API with rate limit handling and retry logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React hook and provider for Internet Identity authentication on ICP, managing login state, identity persistence, and delegation validation with configurable AuthClient options.
React hook that syncs state with localStorage, providing get/set/reset functionality with JSON serialization and error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useOnlineStatus.ts: React hook that tracks browser online/offline status using navigator.onLine and window events.
frontend/src/hooks/usePageMeta.ts: React hook that dynamically updates document title and meta tags (description, Open Graph) based on provided page metadata.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for theming (colors, spacing, fonts) and responsive design adjustments for mobile devices.
frontend/src/lib/calculators/dca.ts: Calculator for Dollar Cost Averaging that computes total invested, total tokens acquired, and average entry price from multiple buy entries.
frontend/src/lib/calculators/decision.ts: Investment decision calculator that evaluates multiple criteria (ROI, risk, price targets, market cap, price changes) and returns a Buy/Sell/Hold/Wait recommendation with scoring.
frontend/src/lib/calculators/futureValue: Calculates future value of investments with initial amount, monthly contributions, and compound interest over a specified time period.
frontend/src/lib/calculators/moonMath.ts: Calculates implied price and price multiple for a coin if it reached another coin's market cap, given current price and supply.
frontend/src/lib/calculators/pnl.ts: Profit and Loss calculator that computes token quantity, net profit, and ROI from investment amount, buy/sell prices, and trading fees.
frontend/src/lib/calculators/risk.ts: Position sizing calculator that determines safe position size based on entry price, stop-loss, total capital, risk percentage, and optional target price for risk-reward ratio.
frontend/src/lib/format.ts: Utility functions for formatting numbers, currency, percentages, and tokens with abbreviations (M/B/T) for large values and locale-aware decimal formatting.
frontend/src/lib/seo.ts: Defines SEO metadata configuration for each calculator module (P&L, Risk, DCA, Moon Math, Future Value, Decision) including titles, descriptions, and Open Graph tags.
frontend/src/lib/storageKeys.ts: Exports versioned localStorage keys for persisting calculator state and provides a utility function to clear all stored data.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Utility function that merges Tailwind CSS classes using clsx and tailwind-merge for conditional styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query, Internet Identity provider, and renders the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/modules/DCAModule.tsx: Dollar-cost averaging calculator module that manages multiple buy entries, calculates average entry price and total tokens, and supports sharing trade plans.
frontend/src/pages/modules/DecisionModul: Trading decision engine that evaluates configurable criteria (ROI, risk, price targets, market cap, price changes) against live coin data to provide buy/sell/hold recommendations.
frontend/src/pages/modules/FutureValueMo: Future value calculator that projects long-term investment growth using backend canister calculations with compound interest, monthly contributions, inflation, and tax considerations.
frontend/src/pages/modules/MoonMathModul: Market cap comparison tool that calculates implied price if one coin reaches another coin's market cap, using live CoinGecko data for price and supply information.
frontend/src/pages/modules/PnLModule.tsx: React component for profit/loss calculation with coin selection, live price fetching from CoinGecko, trading fee inputs, and shareable trade plan cards with offline status handling.
frontend/src/pages/modules/RiskModule.ts: React component for risk management and position sizing calculations based on entry price, stop-loss, capital, and risk percentage with visual risk/reward indicators and shareable trade plans.
frontend/src/service-worker.ts: Service worker implementing cache-first strategy for offline support, caching core assets and skipping external API requests like CoinGecko.
frontend/src/services/coingecko.ts: CoinGecko API service with timeout handling, custom error types (NetworkError, RateLimitError), and functions for searching coins, fetching prices, and retrieving market data.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom theme extensions including OKLCH color system, responsive breakpoints, safe area spacing, glass morphism effects, and animation utilities.
frontend/vite.config.ts: Vite configuration with React plugin, path aliases, API proxy to local dfx server, manual chunk splitting for vendors, and environment variable injection for canister IDs.
project_state.json: Project state tracking document indicating investigation of 'Failed to fetch' errors with existing features for error handling improvements and pending verification of backend actor connections.
